name: Sanders Sides RPG: Digital Nightmare
description:
This is a small fanmade RPG made with RPG Maker MV for the Sanders Sides series by Thomas Sanders!

It's about a 2 hour game.

Join Thomas who's trapped in a video game themed nightmare. He must join the sides and make the way to the core of his brain to see who or what's been tampering in the subconscious.

---

Directions for download.

Download, unzip file, open folder, open "Game"

---

If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, feel free to leave it in the comments.
